    Publications

    Publications as first author:

    López-Cobá, Carlos, Lin, L., Neumann, J., & Bershady, M. A. (2024). On the Role of Noncircular Motions in MaNGA Galaxies. I. Global Properties. 975(2), 182. https://doi.org/10.3847/1538-4357/ad7b12

    López-Cobá, Carlos, Lin, L., & Sánchez, S. F. (2024). Unveiling a Hidden Bar-like Structure in NGC 1087: Kinematic and Photometric Evidence Using MUSE/VLT, ALMA, and JWST. 962(1), 65. https://doi.org/10.3847/1538-4357/ad152a

    López-Cobá, Carlos, Sánchez, S. F., Anderson, J. P., Cruz-González, I., Galbany, L., Ruiz-Lara, T., Barrera-Ballesteros, J. K., Prieto, J. L., & Kuncarayakti, H. (2020).     López-Cobá, Carlos, Sánchez, S. F., Bland-Hawthorn, J., Moiseev, A. V., Cruz-González, I., Garcı́a-Benito, R., Barrera-Ballesteros, J. K., & Galbany, L. (2019).     López-Cobá, Carlos, Sánchez, S. F., Lin, L., Anderson, J. P., Lin, K.-Y., Cruz-González, I., Galbany, L., & Barrera-Ballesteros, J. K. (2022). Exploring Stellar and Ionized Gas Noncircular Motions in Barred Galaxies with MUSE. 939(1), 40. https://doi.org/10.3847/1538-4357/ac937b

    López-Cobá, C., Lin, L., & Sánchez, S. F. (2024). XookSuut: A Bayesian Tool for Modeling Circular and NonCircular Flows on 2D Velocity Maps. 60, 19–39. https://doi.org/10.22201/ia.01851101p.2024.60.01.03

    López-Cobá, C., Sánchez, S. F., Cruz-González, I., Binette, L., Galbany, L., Krühler, T., Rodrı́guez, L. F., Barrera-Ballesteros, J. K., Sánchez-Menguiano, L., Walcher, C. J., Aquino-Ortı́z, E., & Anderson, J. P. (2017). Serendipitous Discovery of an Optical Emission-line Jet in NGC 232. 850(1), L17. https://doi.org/10.3847/2041-8213/aa98db

    López-Cobá, C., Sánchez, S. F., Moiseev, A. V., Oparin, D. V., Bitsakis, T., Cruz-González, I., Morisset, C., Galbany, L., Bland-Hawthorn, J., Roth, M. M., Dettmar, R.-J., Bomans, D.
